==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|親|父}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{l|ja|親爺}}
* {{l|ja|老爺}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おやじ}}

# [[old man]]
# [[father]]

====Usage notes====
Similar to English usage of {{m|en|old man}}, meaning both "''an unrelated older man''" and "''one’s own father''."

Word is relatively masculine in usage; a woman is unlikely to use it to refer to her own father.
